main event: A couple observed a large, round, glowing object hovering close to the ground in Ft. Worth, Texas on June 24, 1955.
interesting points: The object was approximately 50 feet in diameter and about 80-100 feet above the ground., It exhibited a brilliant greenish-white color with portholes or openings., The object was almost motionless for about 20 minutes before it shot straight up at high speed., There was a slight humming sound emitted from the object., The sighting is considered significant due to the lack of any conventional explanations.
witness description: a couple who were awakened by a bright light and noise
